descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to the December 2024 Community Update!

- 110,000 Active Users <3 Thank you for Support!
- Free Trial Play is here, along with new difficulty levels and an Auto Matchmaking System that quickly pairs you with a tailored AI opponent if line takes too long.

Sharp Forks is here with a mission to provide you with the most graphically realistic, and intuitive Pool game in the business.
Crafted around the unique theme of the 1920s. The game integrates advanced physics simulations to deliver high realism in gameplay mechanics, making players feel as if they were physically present in a pool hall.

Some of the planned features include:

- Single Player unlockables, achievements, and Puzzle mode!
- Online Cooperation Mode.
- More AI opponents
- Additional avatars, locations, and utilities.
- Physics, sounds, and UI improvements.
- Spectator mode

And much more!

Stay tuned, and join the 8 Ball Club!
